website_summaries.verdict: Stainless steel salon shears ideal for home haircuts and pet grooming. Comfortably cuts with the aid of its ergonomic finger rest.
pros: These 6-inch scissors are hand crafted from sturdy Japanese steel
Their hollow-ground convex sharp edges cut hairs like butter
The molded handle with ergonomic finger rest eases stress on the hand
cons: A small minority of buyers received dull blades that had not been sharpened

customer_reviews.title: <loading user input...>
customer_reviews.text: What to say what to say... I got these to groom my pom with. I have no idea how to use them. I thought they would be easy to 'pick up' or understand how to use. The first time I tried them was to thin out my pom's derriere. I think I did okay for a complete novice. She doesn't look bad from a distance anyhow. Maybe with time, I'll understand how to use them better. They seem like very nice sheers. The case... sucks. The zipper catches a lot, making it difficult to even open or close the case. And there were stray threads in several places. Very poor quality case.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Cut hair like butter!
customer_reviews.text: These thinning shears are the best that I've tried, and I've owned more expensive ones before. I cut my mother's and my own hair; and we both have a ton of it. These sheers are wonderful for texturizing, thinning and smoothing the layers.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyStar

customer_reviews.title: Home use only
customer_reviews.text: Wife is a hairstylist so figured since they have very good ratings maybe they will be good for her. She finally used them and told me they were no good, and hoped I did not pay a lot for them. She says they fold the hair instead of cutting it. N good for professional hairstylist, good for home use like cutting your bangs or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Ptetty good so far!
customer_reviews.text: I am a licensed cosmetologist so I was a little apprehensive to get inexpensive shears because we apparently know they are usually crap. I've had these for about a week now and I must say they cut pretty smooth they work very well on men's cuts and they work very well overall. Like I said I've had them for a week so we'll see if they last a while. They are also very comfortable I'm very lightweight
customer_reviews.author: elsa rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp Scissors
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for haircuts at home because covid-19 shutdown our hairstylist salon. It has worked great. The blades are very sharp, so be careful. They are comfortable to use. I am lefthanded, and I have no problem using them, even though they are righthanded. Recommended for haircuts at home.
customer_reviews.author: Blind Lemon Pie

customer_reviews.title: the best scissors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these scissors for myself about a year ago and have been using them on a regular basis since. They cut hair perfectly exactly like they did a year ago. My daughter in law had the opportunity to try them and loved them. I bought these scissors for her as well.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Bad cutting
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw the scissors I thought they were going to be working good but once I started using it they didn't. I'm hairstylist for about 10 years and I saw the reviews were good but maybe it's people that are just starting in this hair industry, but for me they don't really work. I waisted my money
customer_reviews.author: viviana castro

customer_reviews.title: So far, really pleased
customer_reviews.text: These are razor-sharp and comfortable to hold. Seem like solid stainless steel bc they have some weight to them, but still feel light enough to maneuver around easily while I was trimming my own hair. Rounded ends are also great safety-wise.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely fine for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: A definite upgrade for me. Not sure how these rank for a professional, but definitely worked well on my amateur dog grooming. My husband has me cut his hair, too, so I think they will work well. Nice weight and cut well.
customer_reviews.author: nana58

customer_reviews.title: Great shears
customer_reviews.text: These shears are amazing. They have a nice weight which makes them feel very good in my hand. I've noticed that I don't get wrist pain when I use them. They are very sleek and professional looking. I was a little intimated by them being 6in" but the extra length is mostly on the handle. I haven't cut myself with them or anything. They remind me of my 5's.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Heumiller

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These Shears are ok. The pair I received was not the pair pictured on the Amazon page. The pair I received are a little smaller and thicker. They cut fairly well, for the price they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: shari tracy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned thinning shears, so I don't have much to compare these to, but they seem really high quality and have worked great the couple of times I've used them. The package they came in was even high quality and a great place to store them.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Zipperer

customer_reviews.title: Great small hair trimming scissors
customer_reviews.text: I recently started cutting my own hair and didn't want to use my kitchen scissors! This pair was small enough to easily handle by myself and made a nice sharp cut. I would happily recommend this to someone who is cutting their own hair from home since we can't get to salons right now!
customer_reviews.author: Herc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and durable
customer_reviews.text: Thinned my boys hair. Easy to use and durable. They seem to be a good value. The case is thin vinyl, but had space to store other small scissors. Will do the job nicely! For less than the price of two haircuts I can create modern cuts for my sons’ thick hair! Win win!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Marshall

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for the price! They are SHARP, and come already oiled. I have only used the cutting shears so far and not the thinning shears, but I am very pleased. I am NOT a professional, however, I do cut my own hair regularly. I would highly recommend these to anyone looking for a good sharp set of shears.
customer_reviews.author: Chittychittychitchat

customer_reviews.title: Low Cost
customer_reviews.text: They don’t seem to cut very well. I am using them on my horse’s mane. I have to cut twice or three times in the same place get them to cut. But, for the price, I won’t be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Jonsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Very good quality. Worked exactly like it was shown to do. Wonderful seller also. Contacted me to make sure everything was ok. Highly recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: I really love these shears
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shears. Excellent quality and have a nice weight to them. If they come in bigger sizes I will be purchasing more! I love the little leather case that they come in. They shipped in a very timely manner and were oiled and sharpened upon arrival. Also, a removable tang would be awesome too. They handle very well. I was very pleased. Great job Jeff!
customer_reviews.author: Currybachtopus

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Thinning Shears!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with these thinning shears! Used for the first time today to do some grooming on one of my Cavalier King Charles Spaniels. So smooth and easy to use compared to a pair I have designed for dog grooming. The price? Incredible! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: JMH

customer_reviews.title: Know how to use thinning shears before just chunking away at someone’s hair.
customer_reviews.text: They were packaged well but delayed on shipping.happy with the thinning shears overall.i went from school thinning shears to these and there’s quite a difference.you should know how to use thinning shears properly before just cutting away bulk.you can easily take more then you would like if you don’t know how to use them properly.very sharp
customer_reviews.author: brandon heath hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Finding thinning shears that are comfortable in ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Finding thinning shears that are comfortable in my hand after 30 minutes has been challenging. I use these shears to groom my Havanese who has such thick hair that when I thin it, I could make another dog out of the amount I remove! (see photos- actual dog & the thinned hair I removed) Since Havanese have hair, not fur, dog grooming products are useless. These shears are sharp, don't pull his hair, are comfortable in my hand and make the job easier. I recommend Mosher Salon Tools 6.0 Thinning Shears.
customer_reviews.author: MorganOBX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dog and myself. LOL
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. I had no idea if I was getting something that would take out too much hair or too little hair. But it is perfect. I use it on my dog and myself. LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Moogie

customer_reviews.title: if your eyesight is poor, like mine
customer_reviews.text: These salon scissors are superb. They are ultra sharp, so be careful getting too close with them, if your eyesight is poor, like mine. LOL Top quality and the leather-like case is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Springer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to do the finishing cuts on my children's hair and they are very easy to use. Very sharp and came in a nice case. The thinning shears were perfect for my daughter's face framing layers and my son's edge haircut with bangs.
customer_reviews.author: acat

customer_reviews.title: Shear ye, shear ye!
customer_reviews.text: After researching several pairs of shears, I bought these for my sister. She is a cosmetologist and she really seemed to like these shears. They sharp and well made, especially for the price. They come with a black zipper pouch and a key tool to tighten the tension.
customer_reviews.author: Srslydntknow

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp and work great. Seem very durable... no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: First time user of Barber scissors
customer_reviews.text: They seem very good. Have only cut my bangs at this point but seem so much better than the household scissors I've always used. Came with a case as well.
customer_reviews.author: G-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I recently purchased this shear and absolutely love every aspect of it
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this shear and absolutely love every aspect of it! The shear is sharp, light and comfortable to use which makes it even more desirable for multiple purposes. I like the leather case which has room for other tools and zips closed making it easy to carry anywhere. I plan to purchase a few more for gifts and can't say enough about the quality of this shear and pricepoint...it is a great find!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: The thinning shear feels very comfortable in my hand and thins the hair amazingly
customer_reviews.text: The thinning shear feels very comfortable in my hand and thins the hair amazingly. I am very pleased with this purchase. The only thing that could make this even better is if it was 5’’ instead of 6”.
customer_reviews.author: TSmith

customer_reviews.title: Would have been great.
customer_reviews.text: Can't really rate the tools, never received. After 4 calls to Amazon and no results I just gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shear.
customer_reviews.text: These felt correct in my hand right away. Light weight. Very sharp. I groom Bouviers and STD Schnauzers. These are great, wish they came a little longer for trimming the larger Bouvier. Have a more expensive shear. They never felt right and didn't cut very well. Please let me know when you come out with a longer thinning shear..8" or more.
customer_reviews.author: Martine Leslie

customer_reviews.title: He "said these are a very good pair of shears for the money"
customer_reviews.text: I had these shears serviced by my scissor guy, he was very impressed. He "said these are a very good pair of shears for the money". I bought these shears to have a pair at home. Now I have a nice pair at home. I usually paid $150 to $200 for a pair of shears.
customer_reviews.author: judy sturkie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Read online, watched a few videos, and then bought these. Very helpful to see the proper technique before using them. This will be a useful tool for between salon visits, as I'm trying to grow out my hair to a longer length. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: however these worked and felt just like those! Very impressed with the craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I'm currently in cosmetology school and needed an extra pair of shears. Of course expensive brands visited my school selling shears and I had brand name shears in my kit, however these worked and felt just like those! Very impressed with the craftsmanship. I also received compliments from learning leaders and classmates on how great these shears are. Definitely looking forward to buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: favorite sissors
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these shears for a couple of months now, they are great for me, actually better than a pair costing a lot more. Glad I bought two pair, helps knowing I can find at least one pair to use.Seems scissors have a way of disappearing at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S Merlini

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice shears! They are very sharp and cut very smoothly. They are very high quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn"t miss a hair
customer_reviews.text: It is what I hoped for and expected - works great. Received in a timely manner. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Glen H. Moshure

customer_reviews.title: Very nice scissors. Seems to be high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice scissors. Seems to be high quality. Have used it once already and am satisfied with it. it came with a nice carrying case which I was not expecting - so a nice bonus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Clutch Powers

customer_reviews.title: I love the weight and the feel of these scissors they ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the weight and the feel of these scissors they are ergonomic to adjust to the fingers curve, They have the smooth sharpness necessary for a professional cut, great for the choosy Cosmetologist
customer_reviews.author: F Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value +  surprise case
customer_reviews.text: I just expected the thinning shear but surprise - they also included a beautiful (leather) case too.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Holms

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, was pleasantly surprised at the good quality at this price. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Pulliam

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and they work great!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for an occasional trim of my son's hair. The scissors have nice balance, and they work great. They also come in a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp blades and the handle fits a lefty like me. Makes it easy to trim my beard ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp blades and the handle fits a lefty like me. Makes it easy to trim my beard and my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These are perfect for my job at supercuts- nothing too fancy or expensive but achieves the result I want them to!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding and affordable thinning shears!! Got my first use today and love them!! Quick delivery, thoughtful followup email, I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Within 5 minutes of using them the blades started catching. Very poor quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni U.

customer_reviews.title: Great shears! and you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Great shears! and you can't beat the price! Just ordered my second pair. I highly suggest if you are a stylist, you really need to order a pair!
customer_reviews.author: sassi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best we have ever had, superb cutting instrument, the reviews were very reveling ans true excellent product
customer_reviews.author: clyde miller

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. I got this as a gift because I was happy with a previous purchase!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: and thins hair very nicely. The only negative about the item is the ...
customer_reviews.text: The thinning shear seems to be well made, and thins hair very nicely. The only negative about the item is the zippered case that is supplied with the shears. It would have been a great way to store the item but the case had a very strong smell of what seemed to be creosote, or something like creosote. I threw the case away, washed the scissor, and am happily using it.
customer_reviews.author: fsa

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am a licensed cosmetologist and these thinning shears preform great!
customer_reviews.author: Keana J. Palm

customer_reviews.title: but they do a nice job taking just a small amount of hair away
customer_reviews.text: The shears seem to be very well made. I've only used them twice so far, but they do a nice job taking just a small amount of hair away. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: garpwarp

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of the shears. I use it to trim and shape hair and nape area. Works like a hot knife on a butter.
customer_reviews.author: Akshay

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a professional hair dresser but these still do a good job.
customer_reviews.text: Works well to cut my own hair. I'm not a professional hair dresser but these still do a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Frida

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: Order was received on time. Item is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: sandra moody

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp. Quality product. I would have given it 5 stars but the thumb hole is a little small for my thumb.
customer_reviews.author: Watson Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Shears
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional beautician, but because I cut my own hair I like to use professional tools. After watching a YouTube video, the professional recommended purchasing his Invisiblade shears, but they were much too expensive for me. I went on Amazon to see if I could find a similar pair at a better price and I did. I read the reviews for Mosher Salon Tools Thinning Shear & took a chance on my purchase. I am very glad I did because these shears have a nice weight & they are SHARP. I've used them once so far, but I'll be using them for each of my haircuts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: C.Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Pro stylist and they worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I had to have my hanzos repaired so I ordered these to use and they exceeded my expectations for sure!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great shear for the price!
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the quality for the price. Are they a Mizutani shear? No. But they are a great value. I intended to buy them as a back up pair, but I use them quite often! Mine did come a little squeaky, but it was nothing a drop of oil didn't fix. It was nice that they came in a carrying case too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They seem to do the job well. My wife ...
customer_reviews.text: They seem to do the job well. My wife cuts my hair and she likes them. I talked with a salon owner one time and she said that barber scissors are very expensive but they weren't. I thank you for them.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an unbelieveable price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at an unbelieveable price. I have very thick hair and these shears work extreemly well. They cut easily and cleanly. Can't believe the quality for such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: DCH

customer_reviews.title: I am quite happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy with my purchase. The scissors even looked lubed which I am quite happy about. I would have lubed them myself otherwise before using them. I can tell this is a company that cares about their products.
customer_reviews.author: Susana

customer_reviews.title: The first purchase was good. But second purchase has squicky noise when cutting
customer_reviews.text: Not constant. The first purchase was good. But second purchase has squicky noise when cutting. No.. oil didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shears. Super sharp and comfortable in use.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sharp scissors and the price was right. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christine J.

customer_reviews.title: They slide though hair like butter. Better than a few of my most ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much...they were very inexpensive. I was looking for some cheap shears while I sent my spend your ones away.I w was pleasantly surprised!They slide though hair like butter.Better than a few of my most expensive shears@
customer_reviews.author: Quincy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: contour to my hand and the thicker thumb rest makes them easy to use
customer_reviews.text: As a professional hairstylist, quality tools make my work so much easier. These shears are weighted perfectly, contour to my hand and the thicker thumb rest makes them easy to use. They came oiled and in a handy carry case. Nice quality tool... great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C Jankowski

customer_reviews.title: Since we have received them my ham fisted wife has been cutting my hair instead of pulling it out by the roots
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how professional they are because my wife uses them to cut my hair. Do they work? Just as advertised. Since we have received them my ham fisted wife has been cutting my hair instead of pulling it out by the roots.
customer_reviews.author: Pigseye

customer_reviews.title: very sharp and works great! should have bought some years ago
customer_reviews.text: was surprised I got a carrying case with the shears. very sharp and works great! should have bought some years ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice ... Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice thinning shears. They are very smooth, cut well, comfortable in my hand. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent thinning shear. It met my expectations. My friend liked it too, so I sent her the link to order for herself.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia

customer_reviews.title: Two wide causes me to cut myself
customer_reviews.text: The cutting blade is fine sometimes a little too good but the width of it is wider than most and I cut my own hand often I'm trying to get used to it but I might not be able to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Shears
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold in hand and easy to carefully cut hear.
customer_reviews.author: ruth zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: It cut well and it's better than the cheap one I had
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get to use the shear until just last week. It cut well and it's better than the cheap one I had. I didn't like the case though. The vinyl cover fold was not completely stitched and it hindered with zipping and unzipping. I had to slowly close it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cuts hair great and fits nicely in my hands great prices and good tools.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shears have been working great for me, love them! :)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The scissors are smooth and very sharp. Just what I needed. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bough for my wife. She's been using it and really likes it.

customer_reviews.text: Scizzors are both extremely sharp and make hair cutting a breeze. Much better than l expected.

customer_reviews.text: Been a hairstylist for over 20 years and I find these shears to be an excellent value. I'm very pleased with the purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Raves from my daughter, a professional hair stylist and her co-workers

I got to tell you she was right. I really love these shear and for that price fantastic.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible shears!!!

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE them. Very sharp and cut through the hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a hairstylist that has 3 of the same brand of shears and thought I would branch out and give these a try. I absolutely LOVE them. Very sharp and cut through the hair really nice. Super comfortable and light. They also come in a nice case. Worth way more than $20 for sure. Good buy! Thank you!!

customer_reviews.title: Love these shears
customer_reviews.text: Love these shears! Very nice quality and they cut beautifully! Comes in a nice, zippered carrying case which I didn't expect (but am very pleased with!). I would definitely recommend these.

customer_reviews.title: They felt great at first
customer_reviews.text: Decent scissors. They felt great at first. I will say they don't slither as well at my gazillion dollar pair of scissors but it otherwise they feel sharp and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Danger

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if the blade is a little dull, or I'm just trying to cut too much hair at one time. But it sometimes won't cut all the way through. Overall, it serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: The best shears I've purchased and at a great price
customer_reviews.text: The best shears I've purchased and at a great price! They come with a nice case that I wasn't expecting. I started trimming my hair as soon as I opened them. What a difference a good sharp set of shears makes!
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: I really like these shears
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shears. The cut is precise, they are on the heavy side, which I really like. If I had to find anything I didn't like, it would be that the finger holes could be larger.

customer_reviews.text: These are Phenominal shears for an incredible price! I have been in the industry for 13 years and have been through several pairs of shears. I bought these as an additional back up pair, but have been using them everyday! They are very balanced and a nice weight.
customer_reviews.author: Thunter

customer_reviews.title: The product exceeded my expectation! The case is particularly ...
customer_reviews.text: The product exceeded my expectation! The case is particularly lovely and well constructed.

customer_reviews.title: Love them so far
customer_reviews.text: Love them so far. I have very thick curly hair and used these with no previous experience. My curls were much smoother and defined once I took some bulk out. They work great for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shears are just what I needed for touching up my hair as it grows out between cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Japanese shears!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality Japanese shears. My only complaint his that the finger rest is not detachable. I am used to not using a finger rest so this could be an issue for similar users. Otherwise I am very happy with the shears.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great shears great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great shears for a great price. All my staff has since purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: Bree Mclain

customer_reviews.title: I am an amateur at cutting my own hair but I do have to say it looked great and the pair of scissors worked perfectly for me
customer_reviews.text: I had my own hair cut with those along with a feather razor I bought separately. I am an amateur at cutting my own hair but I do have to say it looked great and the pair of scissors worked perfectly for me :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality shears
customer_reviews.text: Great quality shears, great feel in hand, and great price! Mosher is the only one I trust to sharpen my shears, so happy he is designing his own line now. Can't wait to see the upcoming product line.
customer_reviews.author: Emily
